dct_description_sm: With bottom text within title cartouche: "A spese di Paolo Petrini, et da lui si vendono in Napoli a S. Biaggio de Librari."
Bottom text within title cartouche has been erased.

"Corretta, et aumentata, secondo le Relationo più moderne, da N. Sanson d'Abbeuile Giografo di fua Maestrà Christ.ma" "A spese di Paolo Petrini, et da lui si vendono in Napoli a S. Biaggio de Librari."

California as an island on Sanson's second model. Engraved by: Antonius Donzel Gallus Sculpsit (lower right). A late Italian version of G. Sanson's map of 1669 (also Rossi, 1677 and 1687) with new titlepiece of acanthus leaves and ribbons. "Mar" is now spelled "Mare" throughout map.
